actionNumber.brief: The index of the action that caused the error
actionNumber.description: If the request has multiple actions, this is the number, starting with 1, of the action that caused the error.
actionNumber.label: Action Index

additional.description: Optional additional information supplied on the throw.
additional.label: Additional

backtrace.brief: Backtrace from where the error occurred
backtrace.description: The backtrace from where the error occurred.
backtrace.label: Backtrace

backtraceEvaluation.brief: Evaluation backtrace from where the error occurred
backtraceEvaluation.description: The evaluation backtrace from where the error occurred.
backtraceEvaluation.label: Backtrace Expression

column.brief: The column in line of the error
column.description: The column in line of the error. This is only available if source contains line breaks.
column.label: Column

errorSource.brief: The internal source filename:line where the error occurred
errorSource.description: The internal source filename:line where the error occurred.
errorSource.label: Error Source

id.description: The mnemonic for the numeric error code (errorCode).
id.label: Error Code Id

line.brief: The line number in the adaptive value source of the error
line.description: The line number in the adaptive value source of the error. This is only available if source contains line breaks.
line.label: Line

offset.brief: The offset in the adaptive value source of the error
offset.description: The offset in the adaptive value source of the error.
offset.label: Offset

parserColumnNumber.brief: The column number where the syntax error occurred
parserColumnNumber.description: The column number where the error occurred.
parserColumnNumber.label: Parser Column Number

parserCursor.brief: The parser cursor where the syntax error occurred
parserCursor.description: The UTF-8 octet source cursor that the parser at the time the syntax error occurred. This can be used as an offset into parserSource if it is available.
parserCursor.label: Parser Cursor

parserLineNumber.brief: The line number where the syntax error occurred
parserLineNumber.description: The parser cursor's line number where the syntax error occurred.
parserLineNumber.label: Parser Line Number

parserSource.brief: The partial/full source available when the syntax error occurred
parserSource.description: This is the source being compiled that was available at the time of the syntax error. This may be the partial source since the compiler sometimes reads source as it is needed.
parserSource.label: Parser Source

recursiveError.brief: This error occurred while processing and handling the original error
recursiveError.description: This is present if this error occurred while processing the original error's catch or finally.
recursiveError.label: Recursive Error

sourceFile.brief: The c source file where the error was thrown
sourceFile.description: The c source file where the error was thrown.
sourceFile.label: Source File

sourceLocation.brief: This is the source location of the error.
sourceLocation.description: This is the source location of the error. This is usually a reference to the adaptive value source location.
sourceLocation.label: Source Location

xctxUUID.brief: This is the UUID of the execution context (xctx) when the error occurred
xctxUUID.description: This is the UUID of the execution context (xctx) when the error occurred. There is normally one xctx per request. This UUID is included by default in log message, which can be useful for finding messages related to a request.
xctxUUID.label: XCTX UUID
